content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1478706233441{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

We Provide
Quality At The
Right Price

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1573123499268{padding-top: 40px !important;}”]Using our product range and worldwide network we are a logistics partner that transports goods to every destination – and offer you logistic solutions for transport by sea, road and air along with the corresponding value-added services. Our service starts with pre-transport consultation and ends with delivery to the consignee.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1571753110301{margin-bottom: -50px !important;background-color: #005282 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1541066924358{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Value-added services PERFORMANCE MODULE

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator el_width=”60″][vc_row_inner el_class=”nohlines”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Procurement of container for purchase
  • Customs clearance import (Atlas)
  • Wooden packaging (ISPM15 and HPE standards)
  • Packing containers
  • Order picking

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

  • Transport insurance (door-to-door)
  • Customs clearance export (AES)
  • Quality control
  • Assembly
  • Storage

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1476789252610{margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”reset-sm-paddings”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1450444940366{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 31px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6″][vc_custom_heading text=”What makes us special?” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]MONNARD gets your goods where they need to be, when they need to be there, in the most efficient way possible.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449127190171{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”reset-sm-paddings”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1450423994691{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_icon drawing=”yes” icon_position=”icon_position_left” icon_width_svg=”68″ icon_size=”71″ icon_width=”95″ title_font_size=”14″ title_font_weight=”600″ title=”Packaging and Storage” drawing_icon=”stm-packaging-and-storage”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1450423999162{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_icon drawing=”yes” icon_position=”icon_position_left” icon_width_svg=”71″ icon_size=”64″ icon_width=”95″ title_font_size=”14″ title_font_weight=”600″ title=”Transport Insurance” drawing_icon=”stm-projects-done”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1449127193884{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”reset-sm-paddings”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1450424067703{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_icon drawing=”yes” icon_position=”icon_position_left” icon_width_svg=”72″ icon_size=”51″ icon_width=”95″ title_font_size=”14″ title_font_weight=”600″ title=”Door to door transport” drawing_icon=”stm-ground-transport”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1450424075450{margin-bottom: 44px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_icon drawing=”yes” icon_position=”icon_position_left” icon_width_svg=”77″ icon_size=”50″ icon_width=”95″ title_font_size=”14″ title_font_weight=”600″ title=”Exhibition Services” drawing_icon=”stm-logistic-services”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6″ css=”.vc_custom_1450444946350{padding-left: 45px !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1476789330534{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Request a free quote” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Get in touch with us via phone, e-mail or the contact form down below.
We are looking for new challenges![/vc_column_text]

    Phone: +49 (0)421/ 322 65-0
    E-Mail: carsten.borchardt@monnard.com

    When contacting us, you agree that your data will be processed. Click here to read the privacy policy.


    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1536926223788{padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #e8e8e8 !important;}” el_class=”meganavihome hide-mobile”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”70px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1536924819697{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]

    OUR GROUP OF COMPANIES

    [/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ el_id=”company1″ el_class=”companyspan”][vc_single_image image=”4452″ img_size=”265×102″ onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css=”.vc_custom_1574950785415{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” link=”https://www.gondrand.fr/en/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ el_id=”company2″ el_class=”companyspan”][vc_single_image image=”3408″ img_size=”265×102″ onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”http://www.ngl-germany.eu/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ el_id=”company3″ el_class=”companyspan”][vc_single_image image=”3409″ img_size=”265×102″ onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.monnard.com/”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ el_id=”company4″ el_class=”companyspan”][vc_single_image image=”3410″ img_size=”265×102″ onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”http://www.monfreight.com/”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” el_id=”refreshmap” el_class=”buttonbackbar” css=”.vc_custom_1536926214972{background-color: #e8e8e8 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html css=”.vc_custom_1540904652188{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1575378930220{margin-bottom: -15px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”homemap”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
